mapper.select: SELECT FREE.FREE_NO,,FREE.FREE_TITLE,MEMBER.NICKNAME,FREE.FREE_REGDATE,FREE_CNT FROM FREE_BOARD FREE INNER JOIN MEMBER_BOARD MEMBER ON FREE.MEMBER_SEQ=MEMBER.MEMBER_SEQ
SELECT FREE.FREE_NO,,FREE.FREE_TITLE,MEMBER.NICKNAME,FREE.FREE_REGDATE,FREE_CNT FROM FREE_BOARD FREE INNER JOIN MEMBER_BOARD MEMBER ON FREE.MEMBER_SEQ=MEMBER.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE MEMBER_SEQ=#{member_seq}
